DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy Duloxetine compare placebo treatment pain patient Fibromyalgia syndrome , without major depressive disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Study Duloxetine Versus Placebo Treatment Fibromyalgia Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Meet criterion primary Fibromyalgia Syndrome define American College Rheumatology Have current primary Axis I diagnosis major depressive disorder Have current previous diagnosis psychosis , bipolar disorder , schizoaffective disorder Have primary diagnosis anxiety disorder within past year ( include panic disorder , agoraphobia , OCD , PTSD , GAD social phobia ) Have regional pain syndrome , multiple surgery fail back syndrome Have confirm current previous diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis , inflammatory arthritis , infective arthritis , autoimmune disease ( e.g . lupus )
